text: Orlando Martínez (September 2, 1944 – September 22, 2021) was a Cuban bantamweight boxer. He won the gold medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He also won gold at the 1975 Pan American Games. Martínez died on September 22, 2021 at the age of 77.Fallece primer monarca olímpico del boxeo cubano ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cuban boxers Category:Olympic medalists for Cuba Category:Olympic gold medalists
title: Orlando Martínez
